mapper.select: select FEEDBACKID, CUSTOMERID, TRANSACTIONID, ITEMID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, FEEDBACKTYPEID, FEEDBACKTYPE, CONTENT, FEEDBACKTIME, CREATETIME, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSTYPE, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, ANSWER, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, MONEY, RETURNMONEY, PAYPALID, ORDERNUM, SELLNUM, WEBSITE, PURCHASEOPER, SELLOPER, SERVICEOPER, PICKUPOPER, COUNTRY, ORDERID, ORDERTIME, EXPRESSTIME, STATUS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, IFRETURN, ITEMPRICE, ITEMPRICETYPE from DB_FEEDBACK where FEEDBACKID = #{feedbackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FEEDBACKID, CUSTOMERID, TRANSACTIONID, ITEMID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, FEEDBACKTYPEID, FEEDBACKTYPE, CONTENT, FEEDBACKTIME, CREATETIME, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSTYPE, STYPE, OPER, OPERTIME, ANSWER, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, MONEY, RETURNMONEY, PAYPALID, ORDERNUM, SELLNUM, WEBSITE, PURCHASEOPER, SELLOPER, SERVICEOPER, PICKUPOPER, COUNTRY, ORDERID, ORDERTIME, EXPRESSTIME, STATUS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, IFRETURN, ITEMPRICE, ITEMPRICETYPE from DB_FEEDBACK
